channel.title: Gotchas on PR
channel.description: Recent content in Gotchas on PR

item.title: Expired distribution provisioning and Yak shaving
item.description: Last Thursday one of my iPad app’s provisioning file has expired. Client brought it to us at the very late moment, the iPad app was distributed internally as an enterprise app.

item.title: iCloud Gotchas
item.description: Integrating iCloud with core data was easy when I found this tutorial, but I ran into few issues while implementing and testing it on devices.
